title: Angels vs Yohane: The Return
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hmhmhmm~♪.... Kyaah!? W-, what are you doing, Ayumu!? Don’t surprise me like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yoshiko-chan, shhh!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hmph!? ....Also, it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You see, Yohane-chan, I was checking if any members of the angels’ army were at the concert venue today. Setsuna-chan and Shizuku-chan are also patrolling outside.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Haaah? ....Ah, aaah.... This is about that thing, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Don’t worry! It seems like none will be coming today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>*Sigh*, Ayumu.... As I said before, no one can oppose the fallen angel Yohane, not when she’s brimming with magical power from the void. Even if they do come-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’ll be a good chance to take revenge, right? I remember. But Aqours has a live today, right? It’d be bad if you were to use your powers before the live. So let us help you, at least for today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>O-, okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Good! I’ll go around the venue one more time, alright? Good luck with the live!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, hey, Ayumu, wait-.... And she’s gone. Guh, I need to do something about this. It’s starting to get out of hand~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>O-, okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Good! I’ll go around the venue one more time, alright? Good luck with the live!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, hey, Ayumu, wait-.... And she’s gone. Guh, I need to do something about this. It’s starting to get out of hand~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
